law.history: Repealed 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 113, sec. 8, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1944 Ky. Acts ch. 112, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1342a-1.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Failure to pay toll -- School district to pay toll for children and buses.
